resources.string: Your device doesn\'t contain a SIM card.

Welcome to \"Remote control via SMS\". This app allows you to enable data (only for versions of Android below 5.0) and wifi settings remotely, to produce a loud beep, or to receive the current GPS location of your phone. That can be done on receiving specific SMS that you\'ll determine. You can also send a SMS to some people automatically, in case of emergency. All the settings are accessible via the menu on the left.
Your version of Google Play services isn\'t recent enough to use that feature. Please upgrade it.
Press 4 times \'Power button\' in less than 4 seconds to send this message. You can add as many recipients as you want, separated with commas.
Data can\'t be activated remotely since Android 5.0
Using root privileges to turn on GPS
Not using root privileges to turn on GPS
Not using root privileges to turn on mobile data
Using root privileges to turn on mobile data
Enable mobile data as root in Rooted
